Description: Outstanding 2018 LP Standard - like new.Current run Gibson guitars getting back to basics.Great guitar w/classic tones and playability.Best color in years - really shows the flame top!!! See pics - no marks, dings, scratches, nothing.Added Pearled tuning button (original included) and knob pointers.Professionally setup with 10s.Ready to rock!Can't return but need to sell ASAP.The Les Paul Standard has always been the mainstay of the Gibson USA lineup, and today, Gibson USA is proud to introduce the latest incarnation of this flagship model with the Gibson Les Paul Standard 2018.Providing an outstandingly comfortable playing experience that's paired with added sonic depth, the mahogany back of the Les Paul Standard 2018 now employs Gibson's Ultra-Modern weight relief pattern. Enhancing the visual appeal of the striking Grade-AAA flame maple top, the Les Paul Standard 2018 comes available in an array of eye-catching new finishes including Blood Orange Burst, Mojave Burst, and Cobalt Burst. Looking for something more traditional? No problem. The Les Paul Standard 2018 is also available in a classic Heritage Cherry Sunburst finish.Equally suited for cozy chording down by the nut or high-speed soloing up in the lead zone, the Les Paul Standard 2018 offers incredible playability and a great fretting-hand feel thanks to its fast asymmetrical Slim Taper mahogany neck and its compound-radius rosewood fretboard featuring comfortably rolled cream binding.Number Of Frets 22Scale Length 24.75"Nut Width 1.695"Neck Shape Asymmetrical SlimTaperFingerboard Radius CompoundBody Style Les PaulNeck Wood MahoganyFingerboard RosewoodBody Wood MahoganyTop AAA Flame MaplePickup Configuration H-HBridge Pickup BurstBucker Lead ProNeck Pickup BurstBucker Rhythm ProBridge Type Tune-O-Matic with Stopbar TailpieceTuning Machines Locking KidneysOrientation Right-HandedOther Features Ultra-Modern Weight Relief, Cryogenically Frets, Rolled Binding Over Frets, TekToid Nut, Amber Top Hat Control Knobs, Versatile Electronics w/Coil-Tapping, Pure Bypass and Phase, Chrome HardwareCase/Bag Included YesCase Type Hardshell CaseSeries Gibson Model Year 2018Model Les Paul Standard 2018
